3379.verse: وَقَـٰرُونَ|And Qarun,|97|109|13635$وَفِرْعَوْنَ|and Firaun|107|131|13315$وَهَـٰمَـٰنَ‌ۖ|and Haman.|98|122|13326$وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|131|640$جَآءَهُم|came to them|112|136|853$مُّوسَىٰ|Musa|83|95|499$بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ|with clear evidences,|161|170|880$فَٱسْتَكْبَرُواْ|but they were arrogant|175|193|6751$فِى|in|48|66|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth,|92|110|100$وَمَا|and not|71|89|46$كَانُواْ|they could|90|99|94$سَـٰبِقِينَ|outstrip Us.|97|97|13636$

3380.verse: فَكُلاًّ|So each|74|83|13637$أَخَذْنَا|We seized|87|104|625$بِذَنۢبِهِۦ‌ۖ|for his sin.|89|106|13638$فَمِنْهُم|Then of them|109|126|2258$مَّنْ|(was he) who,|116|133|76$أَرْسَلْنَا|We sent|82|99|1342$عَلَيْهِ|on him|64|73|395$حَاصِبًا|a violent storm,|124|133|10453$وَمِنْهُم|and of them|100|118|745$مَّنْ|(was he) who,|116|134|76$أَخَذَتْهُ|seized him|88|106|1810$ٱلصَّيْحَةُ|the awful cry|108|126|8594$وَمِنْهُم|and of them|100|109|745$مَّنْ|(was he) who,|116|125|76$خَسَفْنَا|We caused to swallow|168|185|13639$بِهِ|him,|47|64|204$ٱلْأَرْضَ|the earth|92|109|197$وَمِنْهُم|and of them|100|117|745$مَّنْ|(was he) who,|116|125|76$أَغْرَقْنَا‌ۚ|We drowned.|107|120|12951$وَمَا|And not|72|98|46$كَانَ|was|57|83|913$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|79|123$لِيَظْلِمَهُمْ|to wrong them|117|143|7740$وَلَـٰكِن|but|78|104|108$كَانُوٓاْ|they were|87|100|94$أَنفُسَهُمْ|themselves|94|332|87$يَظْلِمُونَ|doing wrong.|105|343|543$

3383.verse: وَتِلْكَ|And these|87|100|2028$ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلُ|examples|85|110|13645$نَضْرِبُهَا|We set forth|104|129|13646$لِلنَّاسِ‌ۖ|to mankind,|97|122|787$وَمَا|but not|69|94|46$يَعْقِلُهَآ|will understand them|157|170|13647$إِلَّا|except|65|293|86$ٱلْعَـٰلِمُونَ|those of knowledge.|154|382|13648$

3384.verse: خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah created|107|118|1990$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|137|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ|and the earth|111|133|2280$بِٱلْحَقِّ‌ۚ|in truth.|78|100|692$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|92|58$فِى|in|48|70|89$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|75|28$لَأَيَةً|(is) surely a Sign|132|337|2203$لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|for the believers.|133|338|923$

3385.verse: ٱتْلُ|Recite|61|75|13649$مَآ|what|53|80|262$أُوحِىَ|has been revealed|141|168|5833$إِلَيْكَ|to you|63|90|45$مِنَ|of|50|78|156$ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ|the Book,|85|112|811$وَأَقِمِ|and establish|107|121|8769$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ‌ۖ|the prayer.|94|103|38$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|88|58$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ|the prayer|91|108|38$تَنْهَىٰ|prevents|78|96|13650$عَنِ|from|54|72|1663$ٱلْفَحْشَآءِ|the immorality|113|130|10111$وَٱلْمُنكَرِ‌ۗ|and evil deeds,|120|129|10112$وَلَذِكْرُ|and surely (the) remembrance|220|232|13651$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|105|606$أَكْبَرُ‌ۗ|(is) greatest.|108|132|1897$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|105|167$يَعْلَمُ|knows|61|85|742$مَا|what|53|65|262$تَصْنَعُونَ|you do.|107|107|13652$

3379.verse: And [We destroyed] Qarun and Pharaoh and Haman. And Moses had already come to them with clear evidences, and they were arrogant in the land, but they were not outrunners [of Our punishment].

3380.verse: So each We seized for his sin; and among them were those upon whom We sent a storm of stones, and among them were those who were seized by the blast [from the sky], and among them were those whom We caused the earth to swallow, and among them were those whom We drowned. And Allah would not have wronged them, but it was they who were wronging themselves.

3381.verse: The example of those who take allies other than Allah is like that of the spider who takes a home. And indeed, the weakest of homes is the home of the spider, if they only knew.

3382.verse: Indeed, Allah knows whatever thing they call upon other than Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

3383.verse: And these examples We present to the people, but none will understand them except those of knowledge.

3384.verse: Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth. Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.

3385.verse: Recite, [O Muhammad], what has been revealed to you of the Book and establish prayer. Indeed, prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing, and the remembrance of Allah is greater. And Allah knows that which you do.
